00023         struct SInvokeArgs
00024         {
00025                 void* values[DELEG_MAX_INVOKE_PARAMS];
00026                 type* types[DELEG_MAX_INVOKE_PARAMS];
00027                 char builtin_buf[DELEG_MAX_INVOKE_PARAMS * sizeof(long long)];
00028 
00029                 void clear()
00030                 {
00031                         memset(values, 0, sizeof(void*) * DELEG_MAX_INVOKE_PARAMS);
00032                         memset(types, 0, sizeof(void*) * DELEG_MAX_INVOKE_PARAMS);
00033                         memset(builtin_buf, 0, DELEG_MAX_INVOKE_PARAMS * sizeof(long long));
00034                 }
00035         };
00036 
00038 
00039         bool CScriptManager::PackFunctionArguments(type* types[], size_t ntypes, SInvokeArgs& args, PyObject* pyargs, size_t startIndex)
00040         {
00041                 for(size_t i = startIndex; i != ntypes; ++i)
00042                 {
00043                         PyObject* arg_i = PyTuple_GetItem(pyargs, i);
00044                         args.types[i] = types[i];
00045 
00046                         if(IsBuiltIn(args.types[i]))
00047                         {
00048                                 if(!sInstance->ConvertToBuiltinValue(args.types[i]->tag(), &args.builtin_buf[i * sizeof(long long)], arg_i))
00049                                         return false;
00050 
00051                                 args.values[i] = &args.builtin_buf[i * sizeof(long long)];
00052                         }
00053                         else if(IsUserDefined(args.types[i]))
00054                         {
00055                                 args.values[i] = ExtractInstanceInfo(arg_i)->instance;
00056                         }
00057                         else if(IsPointerToBuiltin(args.types[i]))
00058                         {
00059                                 NOT_IMPLEMENTED();
00060                         }
00061                         else if(IsPointerToUserDefined(args.types[i]))
00062                         {
00063                                 args.values[i] = &ExtractInstanceInfo(arg_i)->instance;
00064                         }
00065                         else
00066                         {
00067                                 return false;
00068                         }
00069                 }
00070                 return true;
00071         }

00074         PyObject* CScriptManager::callback_invoke(PyObject *self, PyObject *args)
00075         {
00076                 method_member* method = ExtractMethodInfo(self);
00077                 function_type* method_t = method->get_function_type();
00078                 const size_t numArgs = method_t->argument_count();
00079 
00080                 // Validate params
00081                 if(PyTuple_Size(args) != numArgs)
00082                 {
00083                         PyErr_SetString(PyExc_TypeError, "Invalid number of arguments");
00084                         return 0;
00085                 }
00086 
00087                 InstanceObject* instance_info = ExtractInstanceInfo(PyTuple_GetItem(args, 0));
00088                 ExportEntry* export_entry = instance_info->object_type;
00089 
00091 
00092                 if(!instance_info->instance)
00093                 {
00094                         PyErr_SetString(PyExc_RuntimeError, "Invoking method on not initialized object");
00095                         return 0;
00096                 }
00097 
00098                 // Prepare parameters ////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00099                 SInvokeArgs inv_args;
00100                 inv_args.clear();
00101 
00102                 // Instance
00103                 void* class_instance = PrepareInstancePointer(instance_info, method->get_owner());
00104                 inv_args.values[0] = &class_instance;
00105 
00106                 // Create args
00107                 if(!PackFunctionArguments(method_t->argument_types(), numArgs, inv_args, args, 1))
00108                 {
00109                         PyErr_SetString(PyExc_TypeError, "Invalid arguments");
00110                         return 0;
00111                 }
00112 
00113                 // Return value //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00114                 void* retval = 0;
00115                 type* retval_t = method->get_function_type()->return_type();
00116                 char builtin_buf[8] = { 0 };
00117                 if(retval_t->tag() == T_VOID)
00118                 {
00119                 }
00120                 else if(IsBuiltIn(retval_t))
00121                 {
00122                         retval = builtin_buf;
00123                 }
00124                 else if(IsUserDefined(retval_t))
00125                 {
00126                         retval = activator::create_instance(*retval_t);
00127                         ASSERT_STRICT(retval);
00128                 }
00129                 else if(IsPointerToBuiltin(retval_t))
00130                 {
00131                         NOT_IMPLEMENTED();
00132                 }
00133                 else if(IsPointerToUserDefined(retval_t))
00134                 {
00135                         retval = builtin_buf;
00136                 }
00137 
00138 
00139                 // Make call /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00140                 method->invoke(inv_args.values, retval);
00142 
00143 
00144                 // Convert ret val ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00145                 if(retval) {
00146                         PyObject* pyRet = 0;
00147 
00148                         if(IsBuiltIn(retval_t)) {
00149                                 pyRet = sInstance->CreateBuiltinScriptObject(retval_t->tag(), retval);
00150                         }
00151                         else if(IsUserDefined(retval_t)) {
00152                                 pyRet = sInstance->CreateUserDefScriptObject(retval_t, retval, export_entry->Module, SIT_OWNED);
00153                         }
00154                         else if(IsPointerToBuiltin(retval_t)) {
00155                                 NOT_IMPLEMENTED();
00156                         }
00157                         else if(IsPointerToUserDefined(retval_t))
00158                         {
00159                                 pyRet = sInstance->CreateUserDefScriptObject(static_cast<pointer_type*>(retval_t)->pointee_type(),
00160                                         *(void**)builtin_buf, export_entry->Module, SIT_SHARED);
00161                         }
00162 
00163                         if(!pyRet)
00164                                 PyErr_SetString(PyExc_RuntimeError, "Failed to marshal the return value");
00165                         return pyRet;
00166                 }
00167 
00168                 Py_INCREF(Py_None);
00169                 return Py_None;
00170         }

00176         PyObject* CScriptManager::callback_attribute_get(PyObject *self, void *closure)
00177         {
00178                 PyObject* retVal = 0;
00179 
00180                 // Get class type
00181                 InstanceObject *instance_info = ExtractInstanceInfo(self);
00182                 ExportEntry *export_entry = instance_info->object_type;
00183 
00184                 if(!instance_info->instance)
00185                 {
00186                         PyErr_SetString(PyExc_RuntimeError, "Invoking method on not initialized object");
00187                         return 0;
00188                 }
00189 
00190                 ASSERT_STRICT(closure);
00191                 accessor_member* acc = static_cast<accessor_member*>(closure);
00192                 type* dataType = acc->value_type();
00193 
00194                 void* class_instance = PrepareInstancePointer(instance_info, acc->get_owner());
00195 
00196                 if(IsBuiltIn(dataType))
00197                 {
00198                         char buffer[8] = { 0 }; // Buffer for return value
00199                         acc->get_value(class_instance, buffer);
00200                         retVal = sInstance->CreateBuiltinScriptObject(dataType->tag(), buffer);
00201                 }
00202                 else if(IsUserDefined(dataType))
00203                 {
00204                         void* pVal = activator::create_instance(*dataType);
00205                         acc->get_value(class_instance, pVal);
00206                         retVal = sInstance->CreateUserDefScriptObject(dataType, pVal, export_entry->Module, SIT_OWNED);
00207                 }
00208                 else if(IsPointerToBuiltin(dataType))
00209                 {
00210                         NOT_IMPLEMENTED();
00211                 }
00212                 else if(IsPointerToUserDefined(dataType))
00213                 {
00214                         void* ptr;
00215                         acc->get_value(class_instance, &ptr);
00216                         retVal = sInstance->CreateUserDefScriptObject(static_cast<pointer_type*>(dataType)->pointee_type(),
00217                                 ptr, export_entry->Module, SIT_SHARED);
00218                 }
00219 
00220                 if(!retVal)
00221                         PyErr_SetString(PyExc_AttributeError, acc->get_name());
00222 
00223                 return retVal;
00224         }

00228         int CScriptManager::callback_attribute_set(PyObject *self, PyObject *value, void *closure)
00229         {
00230                 // Get class type
00231                 InstanceObject *instance_info = ExtractInstanceInfo(self);
00232                 ExportEntry *export_entry = instance_info->object_type;
00233 
00234                 if(!instance_info->instance)
00235                 {
00236                         PyErr_SetString(PyExc_RuntimeError, "Invoking method on not initialized object");
00237                         return -1;
00238                 }
00239 
00240                 ASSERT_STRICT(closure);
00241                 accessor_member* acc = static_cast<accessor_member*>(closure);
00242 
00243                 if(acc->is_read_only())
00244                 {
00245                         PyErr_SetString(PyExc_RuntimeError, "Assigning value to read-only prorerty");
00246                         return -1;
00247                 }
00248 
00249                 type* dataType = acc->value_type();
00250                 void* class_instance = PrepareInstancePointer(instance_info, acc->get_owner());
00251 
00252                 if(IsBuiltIn(dataType))
00253                 {
00254                         char buffer[8] = { 0 };
00255                         sInstance->ConvertToBuiltinValue(dataType->tag(), buffer, value);
00256                         acc->set_value(class_instance, buffer);
00257                 }
00258                 else if(IsUserDefined(dataType))
00259                 {
00260                         acc->set_value(class_instance, ExtractInstanceInfo(value)->instance);
00261                 }
00262                 else if(IsPointerToBuiltin(dataType))
00263                 {
00264                         NOT_IMPLEMENTED();
00265                 }
00266                 else if(IsPointerToUserDefined(dataType))
00267                 {
00268                         acc->set_value(class_instance, &ExtractInstanceInfo(value)->instance);
00269                 }
00270 
00271                 return 0;
00272         }

00277         PyObject* CScriptManager::callback_new(PyTypeObject *type, PyObject *args, PyObject *kwds)
00278         {
00279                 // type is a field in ExportEntry, so we can get it using offset
00280                 ExportEntry* ent = ExtractTypeInfo((PyObject*)type);
00281 
00282                 if(!ent) // case when __new__ was called by subclass
00283                         ent = FindExportedBase(type->tp_base);
00284 
00285                 // Allocate instance object
00286                 InstanceObject* inst_info = (InstanceObject*)type->tp_alloc(type, 0);
00287                 inst_info->instance = 0;
00288                 inst_info->ctor = 0;
00289                 inst_info->inst_type = SIT_OWNED;
00290                 inst_info->object_type = ent;
00291 
00292                 return (PyObject*)inst_info;
00293         }

00297 
00298         int CScriptManager::callback_init(PyObject *self, PyObject *args, PyObject *kwds)
00299         {
00300                 InstanceObject *instance_info = ExtractInstanceInfo(self);
00301                 ExportEntry *ent = instance_info->object_type;
00302 
00303                 // __init__ can be called to reset object
00304                 if(instance_info->instance)
00305                 {
00306                         instance_info->ctor->destroy_instance(instance_info->instance);
00307                         instance_info->instance = 0;
00308                         instance_info->ctor = 0;
00309                 }
00310 
00311                 // Compose parameters
00312                 size_t nargs = PyTuple_Size(args);
00313                 SInvokeArgs inv_args;
00314                 inv_args.clear();
00315 
00316                 const construct_attribute* constructor = 0;
00317 
00318                 type::attribute_iterator it = ent->Type->attributes_begin(),
00319                 end = ent->Type->attributes_end();
00320 
00321                 for(; it != end; ++it)
00322                 {
00323                         if(it->get_type() != ATTR_CONSTRUCTION)
00324                                 continue;
00325                         const construct_attribute* ctor = static_cast<const construct_attribute*>(&*it);
00326 
00327                         if(ctor->ctor_type().argument_count() != nargs)
00328                                 continue;
00329 
00330                         if(!PackFunctionArguments(ctor->ctor_type().argument_types(), nargs, inv_args, args, 0))
00331                         {
00332                                 inv_args.clear();
00333                                 continue;
00334                         }
00335 
00336                         constructor = ctor;
00337                 }
00338 
00339                 if(!constructor)
00340                 {
00341                         PyErr_SetString(PyExc_TypeError, "No suitable constructor found");
00342                         return -1;
00343                 }
00344 
00345                 // Create new class instance
00346                 instance_info->instance = constructor->create_instance(inv_args.values);
00347                 if(!instance_info->instance)
00348                 {
00349                         PyErr_SetString(PyExc_TypeError, "Failed to crate class instance");
00350                         return -1;
00351                 }
00352 
00353                 // Save the ctor to use corresponding destructor later
00354                 instance_info->ctor = constructor;
00355 
00356                 return 0;
00357         }

00362         // Called when object destructor is executed
00363         void CScriptManager::callback_dealloc(PyObject *self)
00364         {
00365                 PyTypeObject* type = self->ob_type;
00366                 InstanceObject* inst_info = (InstanceObject*)self;
00367                 ExportEntry* entry = inst_info->object_type;
00368 
00369                 // Only owned instances should be destroyed
00370                 if(inst_info->inst_type == SIT_OWNED)
00371                 {
00372                         if(inst_info->ctor)
00373                                 inst_info->ctor->destroy_instance(inst_info->instance);
00374                         else
00375                                 activator::destroy_instance(*entry->Type, inst_info->instance);
00376                 }
00377 
00378                 // Destroy instance descriptor
00379                 type->tp_free(inst_info);
00380         }

00385         // Called when to string conversion is called
00386         PyObject* CScriptManager::callback_tostring(PyObject *self)
00387         {
00388                 InstanceObject *inst = ExtractInstanceInfo(self);
00389 
00390                 if(!inst->instance)
00391                 {
00392                         PyErr_SetString(PyExc_RuntimeError, "Invoking method on not initialized object");
00393                         return 0;
00394                 }
00395 
00396                 char buff[1024];
00397 
00398                 value_type_pair vt(inst->instance, inst->object_type->Type);
00399                 if(!converter::to_string(vt, buff, 1024))
00400                 {
00401                         PyObject* repr = PyObject_Repr(self);
00402                         return repr;
00403                 }
00404 
00405                 return PyUnicode_FromString(buff);
00406         }

00411         PyObject * CScriptManager::callback_richcompare(PyObject *self, PyObject *other, int op)
00412         {
00413                 PyTypeObject *type_self = self->ob_type;
00414                 PyTypeObject *type_other = other->ob_type;
00415 
00416                 ExportEntry *ent_self = ExtractTypeInfo((PyObject*)type_self);
00417                 ExportEntry *ent_other = ExtractTypeInfo((PyObject*)type_other);
00418 
00419                 InstanceObject *inst_self = ent_self ? ExtractInstanceInfo(self) : 0;
00420                 InstanceObject *inst_other = ent_other ? ExtractInstanceInfo(other) : 0;
00421 
00422                 PyObject *ret = 0;
00423 
00424                 switch(op)
00425                 {
00426                 case Py_EQ:
00427                         ret = (inst_self && inst_other && inst_self->instance == inst_other->instance) ?
00428                         Py_True : Py_False;
00429                         break;
00430                 case Py_NE:
00431                         ret = (inst_self && inst_other && inst_self->instance == inst_other->instance) ?
00432                         Py_False : Py_True;
00433                         break;
00434                 default:
00435                         ret = Py_NotImplemented;
00436                 };
00437 
00438                 Py_XINCREF(ret);
00439                 return ret;
00440                 return 0;
00441         }

00446         long CScriptManager::callback_hash(PyObject *self)
00447         {
00448                 InstanceObject *inst_self = ExtractInstanceInfo(self);
00449                 return reinterpret_cast<long>(inst_self->instance);
00450         }
